data.text: You cannot arrest an idea, it is bulletproof.
data.author: Anonymous

data.text: The Quiter you become, the more you are able to hear
data.author: Rumi

data.text: We only see two things in people; what we want to see, and what they want to show us.
data.author: James Remer

data.text: It is not the strongest species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the ones responsive to change.
data.author: Charles Darwin
